Byldrath was a middle class inhabitant of the city of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Byldrath was an elfin male with pale skin, strong jaw, light brown eyes, and black hair, gathered in a severe bun. He wore clothes of quality make.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, the gates between the Lower City of Baldurs Gate and its more affluent Upper City were closed, monitored by the Flaming Fist mercenaries and allowing only the wealthy and current residents of the Upper City through. Byldrath was among those Baldurians who sought entrance into the Upper City. He felt frustrated with being forced to wait in a long queue in hot sun all day.
